name: Faragax
description:
Shoot aliens and protect the space using power-ups

Update 1.1 - The colors are closer to those of the NES

Update 1.2 and 1.3 - Fix bugs

Update 1.7 - Fix the score color in HTML, the size of aliens and the power-ups spawn

Update 1.7.1 - Fix  some sounds

CONTROLS

Arrows - Move

Enter - Start

Z - Shoot
